summary: The bill, titled the "Ensuring the Safety of Our Mail Act of 2025," seeks to amend Title 18 of the United States Code to increase the maximum penalty for mail theft. Specifically, it proposes to amend Section 1708, replacing the current maximum penalty of five years with a maximum of ten years. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives by Mr. Calvert on February 13, 2025, and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
